summary: An ENB preset that makes your skyrim as lush and vibrant as ever. V3 adds better colors, DoF, and water effects for the greatest and most immersive summer Skyrim possible!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#93c47d][size=5]Hello! I am Docter, and I would like to thank EVERYONE for supporting this ENB as it was my first enb ever made. Unfortunately this ENB is outdated, and is no longer supported, and V4 is completely broken. I would like to take the time to announce Docter ENB Remastered! YES! After almost 10 months I am continuing this project else where (:D). Docter's ENB V5 is currently in development and is going to remain so until it is competely ready.
If you wish to check out progress on the ENB and my other projects, please follow on my Flickr [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/126688038@N02/]HERE[/url]. I am very grateful for how popular this ENB became and want to thank the community one last time before I officially retire Docter's ENB. Thank you for using this ENB preset.
_______________________________________________________________________
[/size][/color][color=#dd7e6b][size=3]

THIS ENB IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED AND VERY BUGGY (V4 is at least)[/size][/color][/center]

Feel Free To Tweak this ENB! I love to see customization among the users! But remember that tweaking an ENB doesn't make it yours, unless you change it completely. Enjoy!

____________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]V4 BETA CHANGE-LOG[/b][/u]
1.Decreased Bloom
2.Brighter Nights
3.Brighter Interiors
4.Better DoF Effects
5.Fixed Shadow bug
6.Better Lighting/Volumetric Lighting
7.Added Better God-Rays

[b]NOTE THAT THIS MAY BE RELEASED, BUT IT IS JUST A BETA VERSION SO PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS/PROBLEMS IN THE COMMENTS OR FORUMS SECTION[/b]
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]V3 CHANGE-LOG[/b][/u]
1.Added More Vibrancy
2.Better Depth Of Field Effects
3.Better Saturation
4.More Contrast
5.Clearer Water
6.Better Performance and New Performance version-for similar looks but made for performance
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]V2 CHANGE-LOG[/b][/u]
1. Fixed all problems regarding SweetFX
2. Added more files to the ENB for SweetFX and other effects
3. New Depth of Field look. So much better!
4. Lowered bloom and BokehBias so the game doesn't look too bright
5. Got rid of annoying Lens rings around light sources. HOORAY!

[b]NOTE THAT PERFORMANCE MAY DROP A BIT MORE NOW BECAUSE OF THE NEW SWEETFX AND DOF SETTINGS[/b]
____________________________________________________________________________________________
This ENB is made for those who want their skyrim to look like it's in summer and makes your environment lush and vibrant with a minimal FPS cost compared to similar ENBs

Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0254.htm]ENB Series v.254 or above[/url]
Download The [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!b0wkmbgQ!Z6FQTo7REAX1-4SvIcpixwCKcgks0TWaWdhJGgYINZA]UBER SKRIM TEXTURES[/url] here (Nexus won't allow anything above 5GB)
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]TO INSTALL[/b]
1. Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0254.htm]ENB Series v.254 or above[/url] from ENBdev, (the download button is on the bottom).
2. Extract [u][b]ONLY[/b][/u] the [u][b]d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe[/b][/u] from the [u][b]wrapper version[/b][/u] to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam>SteamApps/common>Skyrim).
3. Download my mod and place into the Skyrim directory

4. Add (or modify) these lines to your SkyrimPrefs.ini file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

5. Open your Skyrim Launcher [b](NOT SKSE)[/b] and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering

6. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB#tab=Installation]For a tutorial Go here[/url]:

ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx
VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx

For the best look I recommend using my Mod Compilation and using the "UBER SKRIM TEXTURES" mod over all the others except superior rocks and Trees_HD Skyrim Variation.

My Blog spot : http://drdoctermods.blogspot.com/
____________________________________________________________________________________________
[youtube]334mpcCz1lw&list=UUBW02ioi94d4EqPgz8XJ_aw[/youtube]
____________________________________________________________________________________________

Skyfix - Unique Inn Signs HD

Footprints

author: TheDrDocter
